mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, create_user, update_user, `status`, commodity_id, information, commentator, receiver, parent_node, order_id, descriptive_match_score, logistics_service_score
mapper.select:
select
from product_reviews where parent_node = '0'
and create_user = #{create_user}
order by create_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into product_reviews (id, create_date, update_date, create_user, update_user, `status`, commodity_id, information, commentator, receiver, parent_node, order_id, descriptive_match_score, logistics_service_score ) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{create_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{update_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{update_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commodity_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{information,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commentator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parent_node,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order_id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{descriptive_match_score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logistics_service_score,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
